title: Joe Lynn Turner - 1999 - Under Cover 2 [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Under Cover 2 is the 5th solo album of Joe Lynn Turner released in 1999. Just like Under Cover the album consists mainly of covers of Turner's favourite artists. The reason he recorded a follow-up was because of the successful sales of the previous edition the label asked him to record a follow-up."The Race Is On" is a re-recorded version of a song that appeared on Turner's solo debut album, Rescue You.

'Lost in Hollywood' was recorded as a tribute to the late Cozy Powell who died in a car crash in 1998.
